name: GooBalls HD
description:
Follow me in the bouncing world of the GooBalls. Your needed help is easy: Control the GooBalls to squash all the purple goo's and leave the level with the red ring.

Sounds easy and the beginning is easy. The levels goes harder and harder and you have to master the seesaws, springs, gravity and the warp transporter.

This physics based puzzle game is hours of enjoyment for the whole family but especially for kids that improve their hand-eye coordination!

Can you master all 40 levels?

Features:
40 outstanding levels
2 system controls
Great playability
Cute graphics
Funny sounds and music
Suitable for children
